 void ElementaryJob.executeJob(Microscope microscope)
          Function which is called at every evaluation of the job.
 void ElementaryJobAdapter.executeJob(Microscope microscope)
          The standard implementation of this function automatically takes care for evaluation counting and the notification of listeners.
 void ElementaryJob.initializeJob(Microscope microscope)
          Called before the first evaluation of a job in a measurement.
 void ElementaryJobAdapter.initializeJob(Microscope microscope)
          When overwriting this function, the base implementation should be called at the beginning, i.e. super.initializeJob(...).
abstract  void ElementaryJobAdapter.runJob(Microscope microscope)
          Convenient function which gets called by executeJob().
 void ElementaryJob.uninitializeJob(Microscope microscope)
          Called before the first evaluation of a job in a measurement.
 void ElementaryJobAdapter.uninitializeJob(Microscope microscope)
          When overwriting this function, the base implementation should be called at the beginning, i.e. super.initializeJob(...).
